meanings.definition: Make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail.
meanings.sent1: She was explaining the math problem to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He spent the afternoon explaining the rules of the game to the new players.
meanings.sent3: The cat was explaining to the dog why it couldn't climb trees.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting was explaining the beauty of nature in vivid colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was explaining the concept of gravity using a simple experiment.

meanings.definition: Give a reason or justification for (an action or event).
meanings.sent1: He was explaining why he was late for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She explained the importance of recycling to her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The clown was explaining why he wore such big shoes.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun was explaining the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The detective was explaining the motive behind the crime to his partner.
